snippet: Cities across the country have shown economic improvement in recent months, but it’s a joyless recovery for people still feeling the pinch.
abstract: Cities across the country have shown economic improvement, but for many people the recovery has not been evident in their day-to-day lives.

byline.contributor: Jess Bidgood contributed reporting from Leominster, Mass.; Isolde Raftery from Seattle; and Steven Yaccino from Belvidere, Ill.

lead_paragraph: Cities across the country have shown economic improvement in recent months, but it’s a joyless recovery for people still feeling the pinch.

headline.seo: Across the Country, Looking for the Economic Recovery
headline.main: Across the Country, Looking for the Recovery
headline.print_headline: Across the Country, Looking for the Recovery
